heading: Fluid Administration
content: IV bags are used for the intravenous administration of fluids which include saline solutions, nutritional supplements, and more.

heading: Blood Transfusion
content: IV bags are usually used to efficiently administer blood products like blood platelets, and plasma to those who are in need of blood transfusion.

heading: Electrolyte Replacement
content: IV bags help in restoring electrolyte balance when the imbalance is due to certain medical conditions, and dehydration.

heading: parenteral Nutrition
content: IV bags are used to offer parenteral nutrition to those who are undergoing a treatment due to malnutrition.
